name: Sublime Scaffolding
tagline: Sublime Text 2 Scaffolding Tool for HTML Web Projects.
body:
# Sublime Scaffolding
*******

A Sublime Text 2 plugin that is used to scaffold a web project i.e. used to generate a basic web project.

# License

  THE SOFTWARE.
